column1: If you see someone without a smile today. Give them yours :)
Be the change that you want to see in the world
Be yourself, everyone else is already taken
You rock harder than Dwanye the Rock Johnson
Your smile can brighten a room
everyday day is a good day with the right attitude!
I hope you have a wonderful day!
The only thing that is impossible is impossibility itself
It always seems impossible until it is done.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow
Everyday may not be good, but there's something good in every day
